ModuleTitle: Global IT Project and Vendor Management
ModuleDescription:
This module examines the high level CEO/CIO perspectives of global IT project and vendor
management. It covers concepts, framework, and approaches to global project management. Global
project management is used broadly to cover activities related to global product development, global
project launch, global sourcing and outsourcing vendor management. Topics on global project organisation structure and governance, contract management, service level agreements, transition and
transformation management, relationship management, dispute resolution, performance monitoring,
risk management, and human resource implications will be covered.
